Interface IDiscoveryService

    ClassicDiscoveryService, LeDiscoveryService

      call back message handler , must not be null
      void setContext(android.content.Context aC)

      default is BlueToothCommunication.DISCOVERY_MODE_FOUND_AND_CANCEL_DISCOVERY
      void startService()
      start service , if bluetooth is not enable , service will stop if context or handler is null , service will stop
      void stopService()
      stop Service
      void useBLEonly(boolean bBLE)
      default is false (communication can discover classic , dual and ble device). true: communication can discover ble device only.

        void setBlueToothDeviceNameFilter(java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> aVector)
